title: Need some help with something.
body: So I'm making a website dedicated to League champion guides, and I was wondering if there was any way for me to implement mastery pages and such. I don't have a lot of experience programming.

replies.body:
A good place to start is probably checking out the Riot API page. The Riot API provides some great data for the type of project you're mentioning. You can check this page out [here.](https://developer.riotgames.com/)

Let me know if you have any questions.
